bill.title: Creation Of Office Of School Safety
bill.description: Concerning the creation of the office of school safety, and, in connection therewith, requiring the director of the office of school safety to appoint a grants manager, creating a crisis response unit within the office of school safety, specifying that the office of school safety has oversight over the school safety resource center, specifying that the school access for emergency response grant program is administered by the office of school safety, creating a youth violence grant program administered by the office, and making an appropriation.
